api_list.name: Offense Rushing Single Team
api_list.description: Offense rushing statistics for a single team
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://nfl-statistics.p.rapidapi.com/offense/rushing/Chargers"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nfl-statistics.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://nfl-statistics.p.rapidapi.com/offense/rushing/{team_name}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nfl-statistics.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Base Teams Statistics
api_list.description:
The base stats for all teams

- wins
- losses
- ties
- win_loss_percentage
- points_for
- points_against
- point_differential
- margin_of_victory
